Package controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FieldSceneControllerInterface
    interface for FieldSceneController
    LobbySceneControllerInterface  
    LoginSceneControllerInterface  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSceneController
    Every Scene created needs its own Controller for its GUI.
    ConfigSceneController
    This class controls the conifg.fxml file.
    DisplayedScene
    Container class to reference a Scene to its AbstractSceneController.
    FieldSceneController
    controller for the scene field.fxml
    GamePanelEndedGame
    game panel to display a ended game in the lobby GUI
    GamePanelNotStartedGame
    game panel to display a not started game in the lobby GUI
    GamePanelStartedGame
    game panel to display a started game in the lobby GUI
    GamePanelTournament
    game panel to display a started game in the lobby GUI
    LobbySceneController
    The LobbySceneController is the controller for the lobby interface.
    LoginSceneController
    The LoginSceneController is the controller for the login interface.
    PlayerPanel
    panel to display a player
    SuperController
    The SuperController is the general entry point of the client.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SceneMapping
    Every Scene is listed here in order to make an easy readable mapping
